about_the_game:
1- Throwia is a 2D, multiplayer, and next-generation MMO RPG with sweet visuals. In addition, it gives importance to social communication between players.



2- The game is a turn-based strategy game. In 2vs2 battles, you aim to detonate or bury opponents to eliminate them. Since the basic mechanics of the game are based on parabolic skill throws, it is extremely important to get the shots right.



3- In Throwia, players can design their characters as they please. There are different types of pets, clothes, armor, helmets, equipment, and weapons. Each weapon has its own special ability. Some weapons are adept at blasting the opponent, some at burying the opponent, and some are adept at healing a teammate.



4- There are many of types of equipment, pets and weapons in the game. Players cannot equip them without obtaining this equipment. To be able to equip a weapon or outfit, they must first win it.

5- There are many ways to earn weapons, pets, and equipment.

A) Players can obtain chests by winning 2vs2 arena battles. Various pets, weapons, and equipment can be found in these chests.

B) There are not only 2vs2 online battles in the game. Players can also battle against AI alone or in teams. They can also gain various equipment, pets, and weapons by entering dungeons, exploring, and fighting.

6- It is not enough to find the most suitable weapon, pet, and equipment for the player. In order to be invincible in the game, they must complete plenty of quests and gain experience points. Therefore, the player must fight and win a lot in order to maximize both himself and his equipment.

7- Players fight to get the best weapon, style, and glory in the world of Throwia. Even though there are many master warriors, there will only be 1 winner. Plenty of tournaments are organized and the best ones are determined here.

short_description: Welcome to the next-generation MMO world of Throwia... Design your character as you wish, choose the weapons that suit your play style, level up, and get stronger... For new equipment, blast or dig your opponents... Build your team and reach the top of the rankings!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Turkish
